generated_body: In the article titled "Taylor Swift Rep Hits Back at Big Machine, Claims She's Actually Owed $7.9 Million in Unpaid Royalties," the user is likely expecting an exploration of the ongoing conflict between Taylor Swift and her former record label, Big Machine Records.
